text: Lili Xu (born 1 February 1981) is a Chinese power lifter who took gold at the IPC World Championships in the 79 kg division in 2016. Xu also competed in the 2015 IPC championships where she took silverOmolayo, Huseynov shock victors at 2015 IPC Powerlifting Asian Open Championships, 30 July 2015, PowerLiftingWatch, Retrieved 7 September 2016 and at the 2016 Summer Paralympics in Rio.XU Lili, Rio 2016, Retrieved 7 September 2016 ==References== Category:Powerlifters at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Female powerlifters Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Paralympic powerlifters of China
title: Xu Lili (powerlifter)
